## MetaState interface

Maintains the metadata for Chat Headless.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface MetaState 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [context?](./chat-headless.metastate.context.md) |  | any | _(Optional)_ Additional information to pass into the instruction flow. This data could then be used in the URL or body of a REST API step, influence Chat API's assessment in a conditional step, or help construct a reply with additional details. |
